entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
